successes.title: The Lomography Lomo'Instant Camera
successes.description: Extend the Borders of Instant Photography with the World’s Most Creative Instant Camera System Packed With Fun Features.

Pledges.description: Cheers to you! You’re helping us on our way to a fantastic instant camera. You’ll receive a pack of Lomography FotoClips for creative photo displays!
Thank you loyal supporter, you’ll receive a pack of Lomography FotoClips for creative photo displays, lovely shutter buttons and the much sought after LOMO LC-A keychain!
With many thanks, we'll send you shutter buttons, the much sought after LOMO LC-A keychain, a Lomo notebook and a photo accordion for a jazzy way to show off your photos!

We’ll send you our Colorsplash Chrome Edition camera: http://shop.lomography.com/colorsplash-camera-chrome-edition for dazzling shots on 35mm film and we will give you a pack of Lomography FotoClips to make beautiful displays of your photos! http://shop.lomography.com/colorsplash-camera-chrome-edition

Wahoo! You will receive the Special Kickstarter Edition Lomo'Instant Camera + Lens Package with its built-in Wide Angle lens plus the Fisheye and Portrait lens attachments included, 3 packs of Fujifilm Mini Instax, a Lomo LC-A+ 20th Anniversary Edition camera: http://shop.lomography.com/lc-a-20th-anniversary-edition and 5 rolls of LomoChrome Purple! Shipping and Tax Information: USA = Free Shipping (Customers in New York: please check the delivery info section). For backers in Canada, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Singapore, please check shipping costs in the "Delivery Information" section.

You will receive the Special Kickstarter Edition Lomo'Instant Camera + Lens Package with its built-in Wide Angle lens plus the Fisheye and Portrait lens attachments included, 5 packs of Fujifilm Mini Instax, a Lomo LC-A+ 20th Anniversary Edition camera: http://shop.lomography.com/lc-a-20th-anniversary-edition and 5 rolls of LomoChrome Purple! On top of this great deal, get Lomography’s classiest collection, the Diana Deluxe package – complete with an array of accessories for the legendary Diana F+ camera: the 35mm back, lenses, flash, splitzer and much more: http://shop.lomography.com/diana-deluxe-kit. Shipping and Tax Information: USA = Free Shipping (Customers in New York: please check the delivery info section). For backers in Canada, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Singapore, please check shipping costs in the "Delivery Information" section.

The Special Kickstarter Exclusive: 
Firstly, you will be sent your Special Kickstarter Edition Lomo'Instant Camera + Lens Package with its built-in Wide Angle lens plus the Fisheye and Portrait lens attachments included and 5 packs of Fujifilm Mini Instax! You will also receive a Lomo LC-A+ 20th Anniversary Edition camera: http://shop.lomography.com/lc-a-20th-anniversary-edition and 5 rolls of Lomochrome Purple film!
And this is just the start: you will take a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Austria for 5 days of the complete Lomographic experience. For 2 days of the trip, you'll discover Vienna via an instant photography hunt in which you’ll explore the city’s best hidden secrets, visit Lomography HQ, build your very own LomoWall and have a night out partying with us too. Then we'll whisk you off to the mountains in a flash for a day of exploration in the fresh air! Please see the FAQ for more details regarding trip dates; you would be responsible for covering flight costs.
